

.. _file_Treelist.cpp:

File Treelist.cpp
========================================================================================



Contains the :ref:`class_Treelist` class implementation, which is used for reconstructing the coalescence tree after simulations are complete. The primary file used by :ref:`file_Treelist.cpp` and :ref:`file_SpeciationCounter.cpp`. 


.. contents:: Contents
   :local:
   :backlinks: none

Definition (``Treelist.cpp``)
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

   :maxdepth: 1

   program_listing_file_Treelist.cpp.rst



Detailed Description
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Samuel Thompson
For use with Coal_sim 3.1 and above. BSD-3 Licence.
